metadata.title: USN-6042-1 -- Cloud-init vulnerability
metadata.description: James Golovich discovered that sensitive data could be exposed in logs. An attacker could use this information to find hashed passwords and possibly escalate their privilege.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6042-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  cloud-init - 23.1.2-0ubuntu0~22.04.1 No subscription required
